document_data.caption: A map showing Myrrdale in eastern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Myrrdale
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrrdale''' was a small town located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Myrrdale was found in eastern Gwynneth in the kingdom of [[Corwell]]. The town sat among the eastern foothills of the [[Cambro Mountains]] near the hidden kingdom of [[Synnoria]].
